meanings.definition: The act of giving wrong directions or advice.
meanings.sent1: Her misguidances caused us to get lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The misguidances from the faulty map led us to the wrong destination.
meanings.sent3: The misguidances from the confused tour guide made the sightseeing trip more adventurous.
meanings.sent4: His misguidances were like a tangled web of misinformation.
meanings.sent5: The misguidances were like invisible barriers blocking our path.

meanings.definition: The state of being misled or led astray.
meanings.sent1: The misguidances of the false advertisement left customers feeling deceived.
meanings.sent2: She found herself in a state of misguidances after following the wrong crowd.
meanings.sent3: The misguidances of the prankster left everyone laughing at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: In the fog of misguidances, he struggled to find his way back home.
meanings.sent5: The misguidances felt like a dark cloud hanging over her decisions.
